name: Mad Zombie
description: This game is a top-down tps game where players must shoot zombies everywhere in this city. This game is designed to allow players to relax and destroy the most zombies. how to play: Press the W A D S button for moving. Press left mouse to shoot. And use the mouse cursor to set direction.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Ghz or faster processor DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Ghz or faster processor DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
